languages.text: {n}Абеляр смотрит на вас немного удивленно, но с искренним одобрением:{/n} "Зрелые слова, Лорд-капитан. И очень верные".
{n}Abelard looks at you in slight surprise, but says with genuine approval,{/n} "Wise words, Lord Captain. And very true ones."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр смотрит на вас немного удивленно, но с искренним одобрением:{/n} "Зрелые слова, Лорд-капитан. И очень верные".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard looks at you in slight surprise, but says with genuine approval,{/n} "Wise words, Lord Captain. And very true ones."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德略带惊讶地看着你，他的语气带着真诚的赞许。{/n}“明智之言，舰长大人，而且非常正确。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at you in slight surprise, but says with genuine approval,{/n} "Wise words, Lord Captain. And very true ones."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德略带惊讶地看着你，他的语气带着真诚的赞许。{/n}“明智之言，舰长大人，而且非常正确。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard te mira un tanto sorprendido y con aprobación.{/n} «Sabias palabras, Lord Capitán. Y muy ciertas».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at you in slight surprise, but says with genuine approval,{/n} "Wise words, Lord Captain. And very true ones."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard te mira un tanto sorprendido y con aprobación.{/n} «Sabias palabras, Lord Capitán. Y muy ciertas».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは少し驚いてあなたを見たが、誠実に受け止めて話す{/n}「賢明なお言葉です、ロード・キャプテン。そして、まさしく正しき言葉です」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at you in slight surprise, but says with genuine approval,{/n} "Wise words, Lord Captain. And very true ones."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは少し驚いてあなたを見たが、誠実に受け止めて話す{/n}「賢明なお言葉です、ロード・キャプテン。そして、まさしく正しき言葉です」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard blickt dich etwas überrascht an, sagt jedoch mit ehrlicher Zustimmung:{/n} "Weise Worte, Lord Captain. Und sehr wahre Worte."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at you in slight surprise, but says with genuine approval,{/n} "Wise words, Lord Captain. And very true ones."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard blickt dich etwas überrascht an, sagt jedoch mit ehrlicher Zustimmung:{/n} "Weise Worte, Lord Captain. Und sehr wahre Worte."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard vous lance un regard approbateur et mâtiné de surprise :{/n} « Voilà qui est sagement parler, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je n'aurais pas dit mieux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at you in slight surprise, but says with genuine approval,{/n} "Wise words, Lord Captain. And very true ones."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard vous lance un regard approbateur et mâtiné de surprise :{/n} « Voilà qui est sagement parler, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je n'aurais pas dit mieux. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, biraz şaşkın bir ifadeyle sana bakıp samimiyetle onaylıyor.{/n} "Akıllıca sözler Lord Kaptan. Oldukça da doğru."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at you in slight surprise, but says with genuine approval,{/n} "Wise words, Lord Captain. And very true ones."
